title: 'All Souls Trilogy' Author Deborah Harkness
teaser: The hugely successful books are set in a world where witches, vampires and demons live alongside humans.
contentencoded:
Deborah Harkness used her background as a history of science professor to write the the hugely successful “All Souls Trilogy.”

The books are set in a world where witches, vampires and demons live alongside humans, and center around the romance of Diana, a reluctant witch, and Matthew, a vampire who’s 1,500 years old.

As the third and final installment, “The Book of Life,” comes out in paperback on Tuesday, we revisit Here & Now host Meghna Chakrabarti’s conversation with Deborah Harkness from last July, when the book first came out.

  • Hear the original segment and read an excerpt of “The Book of Life”

Guest

  • Deborah Harkness, author of the “All Souls” trilogy. Her latest book is “The Book of Life.” She’s also a professor of history at the University of California. She tweets @DebHarkness.
